mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog(title, content, file, good, rdate, cnt, replycnt, blogcategoryno, mno) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{file}, 0, now(), 0, 0, #{blogcategoryno}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT blogno, title, content, file, good, rdate, cnt, replycnt, blogcategoryno, mno FROM blog ORDER BY blogno DESC
SELECT blogno, title, content, file, good, rdate, cnt, replycnt, blogcategoryno, mno FROM blog WHERE blogcategoryno = #{blogcategoryno} ORDER BY blogno DESC
